body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Steven Jenkins and the customer's name is Carol Martinez.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Steven Jenkins, and I’m with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Steven, I’m Carol Martinez. I’m interested in browsing some motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Carol! What type of motorcycle are you looking for? We have a wide variety.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m not sure yet. I want something that’s good for long rides but also easy to handle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. Comfort and handling are important factors. Could you please share your email address so I can send you some recommendations?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol! And could you also provide me with your phone number for any updates?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s three zero three, six five seven, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I’ve noted that down! Based on your preferences, I think you'll love our touring bikes.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds exciting! I can’t wait to see them.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Carol! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.
